title: Byri: Pagam 1
overview: In a small town in Nagercoil, pigeon racing is a matter of pride for hot-headed youngsters and adults. Rajalingam, a young man, whose mother desperately wishes to see as a graduate, gets sucked into this vortex, and earns the enmity of a rowdy-sheeter, putting his life and that of his close friend in danger.
